DataElement.preferredName: Pulmonary Function Test Hemoglobin Corrected Diffusion Capacity of the Lung for Carbon Monoxide Measurement Lab Percentage Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The value as a percentage of 100 related to a broad range of tests that are performed to assess how well lungs inhale and exhale air and how efficiently they transfer oxygen into the blood, specifically an assessment of the diffusion capacity of the lungs for carbon monoxide adjusted for hemoglobin concentration.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pulmonary Function Test Hemoglobin Corrected Diffusion Capacity of the Lung for Carbon Monoxide Measurement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A broad range of tests that are performed to assess how well lungs inhale and exhale air and how efficiently they transfer oxygen into the blood._An assessment of the diffusion capacity of the lungs for carbon monoxide adjusted for hemoglobin concentration._Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Pulmonary Function Test Hemoglobin Corrected Diffusion Capacity of the Lung for Carbon Monoxide
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A broad range of tests that are performed to assess how well lungs inhale and exhale air and how efficiently they transfer oxygen into the blood.:An assessment of the diffusion capacity of the lungs for carbon monoxide adjusted for hemoglobin concentration.

Concepts.definition: A broad range of tests that are performed to assess how well lungs inhale and exhale air and how efficiently they transfer oxygen into the blood.

Concepts.longName: Hemoglobin Corrected Diffusion Capacity of the Lung for Carbon Monoxide
Concepts.definition: An assessment of the diffusion capacity of the lungs for carbon monoxide adjusted for hemoglobin concentration.

Property.preferredDefinition: Measurement; the size or magnitude of something.

Concepts.definition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the value as a percentage of 100.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: v1.1 of VD replaces v1.0 to increase overall field length and include 2 decimal places. 1.14.2016.dmr
